creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: bracelet, one of a four set; main body is made of interwoven, rope-like wire; rope-like wire is also wrapped around the ends; connecting piece is two thick pieces of wire to which the smaller wire is attached; largest with heavier connecting and wrap pieces
title: Bracelet, one of a four-piece set
